Paragraph: After thermal annealing , the hole mobilities of both copolymers are increased , which implies that the crystallinity of the polymer films and ordered lamellar structure of π-π closepacking for polymer main chain are significantly improved at higher temperatures.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: After thermal annealing , the hole mobilities of both copolymers are increased , which implies that the crystallinity of the polymer films and ordered lamellar structure of π-π closepacking for polymer main chain are significantly improved at higher temperatures.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobilities |
| crystallinity |
| ordered lamellar structure |
| π-π closepacking |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| crystallinity |
| ordered lamellar structure |

The following entities do not clearly refer to material properties:

* hole mobilities (refers to the movement of charge carriers in a material, but is not a property of the material itself)
* π-π closepacking (refers to the arrangement of molecules in a crystal lattice, but is not a property of the material itself)
